info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
Mr. Shahid is an exceptionally passionate person, as well as empathic towards his tenants. He arrived to oversee my medical condition. The building caretakers and cleaners are very polite and provide their services with big smiles.
It is my strong recommendation to rent his place at Baridhara DOHS. Good luck!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
I'm an old guest and at the risk of repeating myself I'd like to say again that Shahid is a great host and always there when you need him. I loved my stay and felt comfortable, safe, and in a familiar evironment.
Thank you for everything and see you definitely next year!
Davide

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
This was a short stay for me, about a week and I met the co-host who showed me and walk through the studio I rented. He was helpful and easy to communicate via text. The location is ok and quiet. The host provided cleaning and all other amenities so you do not have to worry about buying the daily necessities if you come here for a weekend stay. I came here during the summer so the water gets extremely hot so you have to hold water in the bucket to shower in the evening once the sun goes out or wake up super early in the morning before the sun says "Hi" for shower. If you don't shower often then it is not an issue.
This is a studio apartment in a family neighborhood in the DOHS area so it is a secure place and guards on the ground floor (building entrance) keep greeting you all time with a big smile. So far I am satisfied with the stay and I recommend who wants a quiet and serene place to choose his apartment.

info: Rating, 3 stars,  · May 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: the sahib place was ok . if you're looking for 4 or 5 star places, then you should look somewhere else. but very safe place, clean room , very friendly and helpful. over all, i think i definitely will stay at sahib Place again if i go back to dhaka. thank you

rating_comment: If you want a reprieve from the traffic and honking in Dhaka, Sabih and Shahid's place is what you want to book. Clean, cozy, well air-conditioned and fast wifi for all your needs.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Picture perfect accommodation with amazing host. Mr.Shahid is very nice gentleman with extremely helpful & very well communicative.This place has everything you need. Staffs are well trained & very co-operative, specially Mr.Kashem at downstairs.I will definitely stay back again.Highly recommended this. Many thanks to Mr. Sabih’s family & Col. Shahid.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2016,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Sabih and his wife are both excellent hosts. They are very good at taking care of guests. The room is cozy and fashionable, and bathroom is clean. I hope people will enjoy here too.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2016,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: The room is cozy and clean, especially the bed is comfortable. It is also fashionable and stylish. Both Sabih and Ayesha are very helpful! They are always gentle and thoughtful.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2016,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Sabih was an exceptional host. Any question I had was almost immediately answered in his messages and went above and beyond to make sure my stay ran smoothly. The room was an oasis of peace in what can be a very busy and hectic city and found all staff, particularly the property manager, very kind and hospitable. Recommended!
